channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gables Close - Southwark’s newest tip, 20th February
item.description:
Builders bags full of rubble and wood - scaffolding foam all over the close and loads of litter in all hedges and edges on the road - so depressing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gables Close, Camberwell, Greater London

item.title: Huge potholes and a crack in the road that extends across the road, 20th February
item.description:
There are massive potholes around the Hanley Road/ Albert Road bus stops on either side of Stroud Green Road. These have been filled multiple times but immediately reappear. The foundations under the asphalt are cracking, and you can see cracks extending across the road in multiple places. I live right behind the bus stop and the building shakes whenever a bus bumps into a pothole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stroud Green Road, Stroud Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Persistent flight tipping on Rowe Lane, 20th February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rowe Lane, Hackney, London
